colleague and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: * 1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien goes to London to rehearse his talk at the BBC
* 1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to A.W. Riddle (10 January 1947).
* 1957 - Bertram Rota writes to William Ready considering the sale of J.R.R. Tolkiens manuscripts to Marquette University.
* 1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Michael George Tolkien (10 January 1958).
* 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to the Royal Society of Literature.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Timothy J. Wheeler (10 January 1966).
